JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , born in DATE . He is Archbishop of ORG of GPE and PERSON and states that he is acting on behalf of the above ORG as well as on behalf of other persons not listed or identified in the application form , namely the church ’s parishioners . The applicant lives in GPE . He is represented before the Court by Mr A. Angelides , a lawyer practising in GPE .

In the course of the events in northern GPE of DATE , the applicant states that they had to leave behind property and flee places of worship . The property claimed consists of immovable property ( monasteries , chapels , churches and graveyards etc ) and movable property ( ecclesiastical vessels , grails etc ) . Since DATE the applicant states that they have been prevented from enjoying the church ’s property . The applicant further claimed that many properties had been destroyed , vandalised , looted or stripped of their religious function and are now used as NORP religious sites , museums , bars , clubs , barns etc . Ecclesiastical vessels etc have been destroyed or sold .
